text:
@realDonaldTrump Good morning Mr President, I saw They have agreed to a $500 billion coronavirus "Phase 3.5" relief bill that would replenish a small business rescue program known as the Paycheck Protection Program (PPP).

Does this bill include a second stimulus for the PEOPLE???

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
